name: Protect the Babey
description:
Summary:

Protect the baby is a game for the Ludum Dare 46. Your goal is to protect the babey, and get him to the portal at the end of each level. 

You do this by throwing him and then teleporting.  If the babey hits any walls or the ground, he will DIE... violently. YOU CANNOT TELEPORT UNLESS THE BABEY IS IN THE AIR. 

The character will teleport to your mouse. You cannot teleport through walls or the ground. 

When thrown the babey will move in the direction of the mouse.

Controls:

Throw: Left Click | Hold down for one second to throw harder

Teleport: E

After death press any key to restart.

You can yeet the Babey into the end level portal without him dying.

Credits:

All work done by Sam Morey during the Jam :)
